about_the_game: In our action-packed cartoon-themed world, you'll battle waves of normal enemies every 9 rounds, while thrilling boss fights await you in the 10th! Embark on exciting adventures, upgrade your skills, and take your gameplay to the next level. Use the points you collect to unlock cards that allow you to customize and strengthen your character as you like. Plan your strategy, overcome waves of enemies, and defeat the bosses to pave your way to victory! Be ready for surprises at every turn in this adrenaline-fueled adventure!

short_description: In our action-packed cartoon-themed game, you'll face waves of normal enemies every 9 rounds, while powerful bosses await you in the 10th round! Unlock various skills to upgrade your character and use your points in the card system to personalize your gameplay. Challenging boss battles await you!
